title: Nutclear Boom
alternative_title: Hardcore First Middle ; Hardcore Middle ; 硬核一中
status: Hardcore First Middle ; Hardcore Middle ; 硬核一中
description:
Description :
        Hardcore First Middle has a historical problem: the students are too good at studying! So, this hot-blooded school filled with high-achieving students launched a "NUTCLEAR BOOM" ranking competition. The misfit transfer student Rong Xingye, isolated by the entire school, faces against the famous ranking GangStaR, TyCooN, hiGHnEss, and other opponents who are threats to winning the NUT prize. However, after he accidentally violates the ban on fighting, Rong Xinge is forced to live side by side with his opponents… only to find out that his transfer was a trap from the very beginning!
